channel.title: Mino on Misa's Odekake Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Mino on Misa's Odekake Blog

item.title: Mino Fall
item.description: I went to see Mino fall. The way from the station was a good hiking course for me who haven’t had much exercise. I feel the impact of the monkies was bigger than the fall. The international visitor sat on the bench, he took his eyes off, in the next moment a bag of snack in his tote bag was stolen by monkey!! I was scary whether I was also

item.title: Owl Café Crew, a café where you can touch owls
item.description: I had a dinner at Owl Café, which is called Owl Café Crew, in Mino City. I wondered if owls are nocturnal and are more active at night, so I visited at dinner. I rubbed them! It was fluffy! I was satisfied with not only the owls but also the foods The galette was unusual meal for me and it tasted so good.
